    • Method Detail

      • scaleToModel

        public static ij.ImagePlus scaleToModel(ij.ImagePlus image,
                                        DeepLearningModelConfiguration modelConfiguration,
                                        TransformScale2DAlgorithm scale2DAlgorithm,
                                        boolean scaleWidthAndHeight,
                                        boolean copySlices,
                                        JIPipeProgressInfo progressInfo)
        Scales the input image to the model parameters if it does not fit Will apply scaling of width and height if enabled and copy to higher dimensions
        Parameters:
        image - the image
        modelConfiguration - the model configuration
        scale2DAlgorithm - the scaling algorithm
        scaleWidthAndHeight - if the width and height should be scaled
        copySlices - if generated slices should be copied from their closest existing slices or be set to black
        Returns:
        scaled image
